name: vahramaghabalyan/laravelblogsingle
description: Simple blog package (with admin panel) for Laravel (8.x) based on Binshops. Includes all views, controllers, routes and can add a blog to any existing Laravel app. Fully customisable blog (view, urls, and many other options). Includes image uploads and a pretty admin interface to manage your blog. Defaults to /blog but you can change it to anything.
